column4: Can I just copy a LiveCD to my filesystem to install, or do I need to do more?
you can use special tools to put the live CD direct onto a US disk so I dont see why not, you will need to do a lot of the stuff the installer does manually
thank you. Yes, I imagine so. Obviously I'll need to create a user, for example. But the idea is workable in practice?
it can work, its just a bit messy. The installer is much more graceful
